name: cloud-storage
title: External Cloud Storage
description:
Use Dataloop's Python SDK to integrate your data with your cloud-storage (GCS/S3/Azure), create datasets, upload/link your data items, manage your datasets, and download data.

See our SDK Getting Started guide at https://dataloop.ai/docs/sdk-register.

content.description: Create a Lambda to sync a Bucket with Dataloop's Dataset
